oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Separate Cinema
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Hallelujah!"; film; Vidor, King; African Americans; magazines;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Midsection in the magazine Film Comment includes notable African American films and actors from the past, including actors that starred in the film "Hallelujah!" along with its director King Vidor. Pages 29 through 46.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Donated by Rubye Woodruff Carter; Manuscript collection processed by Heather Tankersley;
